name: Happy Bird Fall Down
description:
Are you ready for fast paced fun?

Move the bowl to get happy bird eggs.
Simple but funny and exciting.

Happy Bird Fall down is at it again rolling down through the clouds, trying to drop down for as long as possible.


Compete with your friends for the best score, while having tons of fun. There's tons of enjoyment packed in as we have continued to fine tune the formula to brilliantly balance, speed, challenge, and fun.

- Beautiful scene and lovely birds.
-Tilt & touch control options.
- Beautiful music
